SetupSRL;

until(false)

item.title: I trying to start scripting, advise needed for the fist one
item.dc:creator: @bobby Bobby
item.description:
@bobby wrote:

This is my script post advice on how to make slr randoms and stuff, cause I might make an autotyper later. Also, it is a total mishmosh, I want it to type the mean things quickly if no; and slowly if yes

[scar]//Author : Bobby//

program Getyourselfbanned;
{.include SRL\SRL.scar}
var text, typehumanlike: string;
Procedure Setup;
begin;
text:= ‘Jagex is a retarded freak’;//What you want it to say
typehumanlike:= ‘no’;//Yes for human typing, no for super-spam!
end;
Procedure SRL;
begin
SetupSRL;
end;

Procedure Clientontop;
begin
ActivateClient;
end;

Procedure Talk;
begin
if typehumanlike = ‘yes’ then;
begin
TypeSend(text);
Wait(Random(100)+Random(100));
end
if typehumanlike = ‘no’ then;
begin
SendKeys(text);
end
end;
begin;
repeat
wait(10000)
sendkeys(‘Jagex is a retarded freak’)
sendkeysvb(’{ENTER}’,true)
wait(900)
sendkeys(‘andrews d1cl{ when on fire’)
sendkeysvb(’{ENTER}’,true)
wait(900)
sendkeys(‘Plz go to moparisthebest.com for cheats!’)
sendkeysvb(’{ENTER}’,true)
wait(900)
sendkeys(‘I am using Scar to auto talk! .9 seconds/sentence!’)
sendkeysvb(’{ENTER}’,true)
wait(900)
sendkeys(‘Good morning, this is Jagex staff please tell your pass as there is something wrong with your account!’)
sendkeysvb(’{ENTER}’,true)
wait(900)
sendkeys(‘RuneScape is the lamest game ever!!Macroing makes it fun!’)
sendkeysvb(’{ENTER}’,true)
wait(900)
sendkeys(‘RuneScape is the g3yest game ever in my life…’)
sendkeysvb(’{ENTER}’,true)
wait(900)
sendkeys(‘Go to : wowomg.30m)
sendkeysvb(’{ENTER}’,true)
sendkeys(‘Look, i am macroing! I am never gonna STOP!!!’)
sendkeysvb(’{ENTER}’,true)
wait(900)
sendkeys(‘Jagex is a retarded freak’)
sendkeysvb(’{ENTER}’,true)
wait(900)
sendkeys(‘andrews d1cl{ when on fire’)
sendkeysvb(’{ENTER}’,true)
wait(900)
sendkeys(‘Plz go to gamerzplanet.net for cheats!’)
sendkeysvb(’{ENTER}’,true)
wait(900)
sendkeys(‘I am using Scar to auto talk! .9/sentence!’)
sendkeysvb(’{ENTER}’,true)
wait(900)
sendkeys(‘Good morning, this is Jagex staff please tell your pass’)
sendkeysvb(’{ENTER}’,true)
wait(900)
sendkeys(‘As there is something wrong with your account!’)
sendkeysvb(’{ENTER}’,true)
wait(900)
sendkeys(‘RuneScape is the lamest game ever!!Macroing makes it fun!’)
sendkeysvb(’{ENTER}’,true)
wait(900)
sendkeys(‘RuneScape is the g3yest game ever in my life…’)
sendkeysvb(’{ENTER}’,true)
wait(900)
sendkeys(‘Go to : meatspin.com for cheats!)
sendkeysvb(’{ENTER}’,true)
sendkeys(‘Look, i am macroing! I am never gonna STOP!!!’)
sendkeysvb(’{ENTER}’,true)
wait(900)
sendkeys(‘Jagex is a retarded freak’)
sendkeysvb(’{ENTER}’,true)
wait(900)
sendkeys(‘andrews d1cl{ when on fire’)
sendkeysvb(’{ENTER}’,true)
wait(900)
sendkeys(‘Plz go to gamerzplanet.net for cheats!’)
sendkeysvb(’{ENTER}’,true)
wait(900)
sendkeys(‘I am using Scar to auto talk! .9sec/sentence!’)
sendkeysvb(’{ENTER}’,true)
wait(900)
sendkeys(‘Good morning, this is Jagex staff please tell your pass’)
sendkeysvb(’{ENTER}’,true)
wait(900)
sendkeys(‘As there is something wrong with your account!’)
sendkeysvb(’{ENTER}’,true)
wait(900)
sendkeys(‘RuneScape is the lamest game ever!!Macroing makes it fun!’)
sendkeysvb(’{ENTER}’,true)
wait(900)
sendkeys(‘RuneScape is the g3yest game ever in my life…’)
sendkeysvb(’{ENTER}’,true)
wait(900)
sendkeys(‘Go to : meatspin.30m’)
sendkeysvb(’{ENTER}’,true)
sendkeys(‘Look, i am macroing! I am never gonna STOP!!!’)
sendkeysvb(’{ENTER}’,true)
wait(900)
sendkeys(‘Jagex is a retarded freak’)
sendkeysvb(’{ENTER}’,true)
wait(900)
sendkeys(‘andrews d1cl{ when on fire’)
sendkeysvb(’{ENTER}’,true)
wait(900)
sendkeys(‘Plz go to gamerzplanet.net for cheats!’)
sendkeysvb(’{ENTER}’,true)
wait(900)
sendkeys(‘I am using Scar to auto talk! .9 sec/sentence!’)
sendkeysvb(’{ENTER}’,true)
wait(900)
sendkeys(‘Good morning, this is J@gex staff please tell your pass’)
sendkeysvb(’{ENTER}’,true)
wait(900)
sendkeys(‘As there is something wrong with your account!’)
sendkeysvb(’{ENTER}’,true)
wait(900)
sendkeys(‘RuneScape is the lamest game ever!!Macroing makes it fun!’)
sendkeysvb(’{ENTER}’,true)
wait(900)
sendkeys(‘RuneScape is the g3yest game ever in my life…’)
sendkeysvb(’{ENTER}’,true)
wait(900)
sendkeys(‘go to wowomg.com for runescape cheats’)
sendkeysvb(’{ENTER}’,true)
until(false)
begin
ActivateClient;
SetupSRL;
repeat
Talk;
Setup;
until(false)
end.[/scar]
